text: 3.16 Lom 15.4, 2 Ti 2.21, 2 Pi 1.20-21 Buk Baybol takaw ak mɨdupsek, God Kawnan ne nokom ak gos ñek tɨkɨlak. Ak nɨm, chɨn takaw teplep anɨb ak dɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agñɨl, gos tɨmel nɨgɨnɨgel okok kɨlop tɨmud wuk tep gɨl, tap tɨmel gɨnɨgel okok kɨlop agñɨ tep gɨl, teplep yɨbɨl yenɨgel agɨl, agñɨ tep gɨnɨgun.
